ygData.subject: Re: Piercing or blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Piercing is the way to go.  I am an advocate of it because of the Pugius, the fanged skull stilleto, and the certain skull that was talked about so many times
ygData.messageBody:
Piercing is the way to go. I am an advocate of it because of the Pugius, the
fanged skull stilleto, and the certain skull that was talked about so many
times prior. With a Pugius right now at lvl 13, and the skull, life is much
easier. Plus 20 mana is better than the runed staff can provide, and the
Pugius attacks much, much quicker. I am still looking for a fanged skull
stilleto (anyone know where to get them), but once I have found one, life
will be much easier.
Zaeq, Wizard of E'ci
